description:
Cochlea is a http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghoul] detention center located in the 23rd Ward owned by the http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG]. Captured ghouls get detained here after the decision is made to keep them alive either for information, quinque materials, or any other exceptional need from them.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Cochlea
